alert.note: Alert for Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 5:17PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ulster and southwestern Greene Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 517 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fleischmanns, or 14 miles west of Hunter, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Hunter, Windham, Lanesville, Phoenicia, Shandaken, Ashland, Jewett, Lexington, Tannersville, Durso Corner, Mapledale, Mosquito Point, North Lexington, Big Indian, Maplecrest, Chichester, Haines Falls, Allaben, West Jewett and South Jewett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central New York.
